__e: Every week this scumbag puts the squeeze on us, and every week you roll out the welcome wagon, like he's family.
You're the best in the world at getting out of tight spots, and I was in a really tight spot.

The perfect words to express how-- how truly sorry I am probably don't exist, so I'll just tell you what I know, which is that I felt cornered, and I lashed out, which is not an-- There's no excuses--
Max is just a little sensitive about handshake stuff because someone did the whole "down low, too slow" thing to him when he was a kid.
Handshakes are also fine. Just let him initiate contact.
School would no longer be a safe place for me to shake hands.
